page.title: 02BROUGHTY FERRY - ATTITUDES
page.content: {STANDARDS} Broughty Ferry residents are immensely keen to retain their independence and keep their suburb as individual as possible. The standard of appearance of the houses, gardens, Parks, beach and shopping centres is indicative of this wish. {DOGS IN PARKS}Dogs roaming freely have recently caused a nuisance in parks where children play. Restrictions and heavier fines have been imposed to act as a deterrent. {DEVELOPMENTS} Residents are quick to form action groups to present their attitudes in relation to developments in the area. Meetings are speedily arranged by residents to discuss any proposed developments.
